title: Cross-Domain Institutional Capture: Governance Transformation Strategies in 2025
summary: Comprehensive analysis reveals emerging institutional capture strategies operating across multiple governance domains. Research identifies systematic approaches to transforming institutional frameworks through coordinated cross-sectoral interventions, leveraging digital transformation, regulatory reengineering, and strategic personnel placement.

sources.title: Digital Transformation Governance: Strategic Coordination in 2025
The Role of Digital Transformation Audits: Transforming While Upholding Governance Standards
